channel.title: How to make money on Adbux.org
channel.description:
[center][b]Table Of Content[/b] 1. Intro about Adbux.org 2. Registering 3. Activating + Logging In 4. Getting money with the ads
[b]1. Intro about Adbux.org[/b] Adbux.org is a site that helps you make money through clicking ads. For every ad you click you earn 0.01 dollar = 1 dollar cent. You might think, why would they do that? Well let me explain: [i]They ask for sponsors $3.40 per 100 views. 340 cents = 100 views 3.4 cents = 1 view they pay you 1 cent per view 3.4 - 1 = 2.4. They earn 2.4 cent per ad you click.[/i] So they earn 2.4, but you earn 1 cent per view. There are usually arround 10 ads a day = 10 cent per day. But there is more, You can have referrals. A referral is someone you linked to the site. for everyclick a referral makes you also earn 1 cent so If you have 10 referrals and they all click 10 ads a day + you do your own you earn 1.10 dollar a day = 7.70 a week = 30.80 a month. You'll now probably get the point, for more information check: [url=http://adbux.org/how.php]http://adbux.org/how.php[/url]
[b]2. Registering[/b] To register, Go to the Adbux.org site: [url=http://adbux.org/]http://adbux.org[/url] Then click the link, seen in this picture
[url=http://img263.imageshack.us/my.php?image=registeree8.jpg][img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/9097/registeree8.th.jpg[/img][/url]
Then fill the form in:
[url=http://img170.imageshack.us/my.php?image=signupvh7.jpg][img]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/8448/signupvh7.th.jpg[/img][/url]
[b]3. Activating + Logging In[/b]
Go to the mail hosting from what mail you used to sign up, in my case Hotmail, and look up the mail from "AdBux" with the subject "AdBux Activation"
[url=http://img100.imageshack.us/my.php?image=mail1uq4.jpg][img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/83/mail1uq4.th.jpg[/img][/url]
Open it, and click the link
[url=http://img171.imageshack.us/my.php?image=mail2hb7.jpg][img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/8406/mail2hb7.th.jpg[/img][/url]
You've now activated your account, now it's time to log in, Go to the homepage and click the login button
[url=http://img186.imageshack.us/my.php?image=logingv5.jpg][img]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/3104/logingv5.th.jpg[/img][/url]
Log in with your details
[url=http://img263.imageshack.us/my.php?image=login2uu4.jpg][img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/2630/login2uu4.th.jpg[/img][/url]
[b]4. Getting money with the ads[/b]
So, this is the actual money making part. First thing to do: Click the "Surf Ads" link
[url=http://img120.imageshack.us/my.php?image=onceloggedinqb3.jpg][img]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/6721/onceloggedinqb3.th.jpg[/img][/url]
And then check which one's are available
[url=http://img293.imageshack.us/my.php?image=adsgd3.jpg][img]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/240/adsgd3.th.jpg[/img][/url]
Then click the link and stay on the page until the timer reaches 0, Sometimes you have to wait before you see the timer, the page has to be loaded first.
[url=http://img171.imageshack.us/my.php?image=timercd2.jpg][img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/6497/timercd2.th.jpg[/img][/url]
then If you've done everything correct, you'll see this thing show up next to the timer: [img]http://adbux.org/images/cash.gif[/img] If you've done something wrong, You'll see a big red block with a cross in it. *no picture, sorry*
Well, thats it, no go out and make money for whatever you want to do RS, WoW, something else maybe.
//Darkmaxxie [/center]

item.title: How to make money on Adbux.org
item.dc:creator: @darkmax darkmax
item.description:
@darkmax wrote:

[center]Table Of Content

  1. Intro about Adbux.org
  2. Registering
  3. Activating + Logging In
  4. Getting money with the ads

1. Intro about Adbux.org
Adbux.org is a site that helps you make money through clicking ads.
For every ad you click you earn 0.01 dollar = 1 dollar cent.
You might think, why would they do that? Well let me explain:
They ask for sponsors $3.40 per 100 views.
340 cents = 100 views
3.4 cents = 1 view
they pay you 1 cent per view
3.4 - 1 = 2.4. They earn 2.4 cent per ad you click.
So they earn 2.4, but you earn 1 cent per view.
There are usually arround 10 ads a day = 10 cent per day.
But there is more, You can have referrals.
A referral is someone you linked to the site.
for everyclick a referral makes you also earn 1 cent
so If you have 10 referrals and they all click 10 ads a day + you do your own you earn 1.10 dollar a day = 7.70 a week = 30.80 a month.
You’ll now probably get the point, for more information check: http://adbux.org/how.php

2. Registering
To register, Go to the Adbux.org site: http://adbux.org
Then click the link, seen in this picture

Then fill the form in:

3. Activating + Logging In

Go to the mail hosting from what mail you used to sign up, in my case Hotmail, and look up the mail from “AdBux” with the subject “AdBux Activation”

Open it, and click the link

You’ve now activated your account, now it’s time to log in, Go to the homepage and click the login button

Log in with your details

4. Getting money with the ads

So, this is the actual money making part. First thing to do: Click the “Surf Ads” link

And then check which one’s are available

Then click the link and stay on the page until the timer reaches 0, Sometimes you have to wait before you see the timer, the page has to be loaded first.

then If you’ve done everything correct, you’ll see this thing show up next to the timer:
If you’ve done something wrong, You’ll see a big red block with a cross in it. no picture, sorry

Well, thats it, no go out and make money for whatever you want to do RS, WoW, something else maybe.

//Darkmaxxie
[/center]
